bibl.title: "Hesuzugike koinoktemosune kata to dikaion ton papuron kai hoi Persai tes epigones".
bibl.note: Reproduit de: "Scheseis goneon kai teknon kata to buzantinon dikaion meta sumbolon eis to archaion kai to hellenistikon. Parartema B'" (Athènes, 1946) pp. 140-154.

bibl.title: Anastasios P. Christophilopoulos, "Dikaion kai Historia. Mikra meletemata"

bibl.seg: Christophilopoulos Anastasios P., "Hesuzugike koinoktemosune kata to dikaion ton papuron kai hoi Persai tes epigones".
Anastasios P. Christophilopoulos, "Dikaion kai Historia. Mikra meletemata" (Athènes, 1973) pp. 94-105.
Reproduit de: "Scheseis goneon kai teknon kata to buzantinon dikaion meta sumbolon eis to archaion kai to hellenistikon. Parartema B'" (Athènes, 1946) pp. 140-154.
